content.html: New Year's Eve. As most of you know, I had a really difficult year. I've been absolutely blown away by how kind and supportive people have been, and that includes you. If you've interacted with me in any way, you've helped. Thank you all so much. ❤️
content.value:
New Year's Eve.

As most of you know, I had a really difficult year.

I've been absolutely blown away by how kind and supportive people have been, and that includes you. If you've interacted with me in any way, you've helped.

Thank you all so much. ❤️
